keyPolicies.policyDescription: Average family has seen TAX BILL cut by over £600 with £825 TAX CUT thanks to Liberal Democrat policies; Tax Breaks for Millionaires cut and taxes down on working families.
Pupils at schools get £1300 in extra funding per pupil; free school meals and smaller class sizes ensure attention to individual learning needs.
Better Pensions with the 'triple lock' system, ensuring pensions rise every year by inflation, earnings or 2.5%, whichever is highest.
Legislated for same-sex couples’ marriage, and for the words 'husband' and 'wife' to be kept in relevant laws.
Axes plans to store everyone’s emails; scraps ID card scheme; and stopped the storage of innocent people’s DNA.
Deliver significant increases in social housing, with a target of 10% of existing homes back into use over the next 30 years.
1.5 million Apprenticeships started since 2010, up 76% thanks to Liberal Democrat influence.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Together, Seamus and I can stop our energetic, open town from becoming a hotbed for the opposition - your vote for a principled campaigner makes a difference.

issues.education: Additional funding for schools ensures attention to individual learning needs.
issues.governance: Axed plans to store everyone's emails and scrapped ID card scheme; stopped storage of innocent people's DNA.

housing.content: Deliver significant increases in social housing, with a target of 10% of existing homes back into use over the next 30 years.

images.caption: Leaflet image with policy highlights of the Felixstowe Branch Liberal Democrats focusing on Felixstowe Allenby Ward.
